item.slashblade.ex.tukumo.desc: Article of The Iron Wooden Sword
item.slashblade.ex.muramasa.desc: One of the lost muramasa swords.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul:
Limit of Refine=50
Blade is Fragile.
The soul never wastes.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_tiny:
Limit of Refine=10
Mysterious burning soul.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_ingot:
Limit of Refine=100
Steel forged with a burning soul.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_sphere:
Limit of Refine=150
Smelting
Jewel of Steel with a faint flame.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_crystal:
Limit of Refine=200
Blasting
The core of the blade soul.
adv.slashblade.proudsoul_trapezohedron:
Unlimited Refinement
Smoking
The blade soul that arrives at the end.
adv.slashblade.reforge.desc: Blades and components are assembled using anvils.
adv.slashblade.refine.desc: Blades increase their potential each time they are refined.
adv.slashblade.bladestand.desc: A place to rest your blades.
